alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southeastern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Monticello, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Boston, Alma, Fincher, Dills, Grooverville, Festus, Lois, Everett, Eason, Miccosukee, Jarrott, Montivilla, Lloyd, Ashville, Metcalf, Lake Miccosukee and Casa Blanco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.
